channel.title: Policy & Security Think Tank Updates
channel.description: Custom RSS feed from CSIS, CFR, and other policy institutions

item.title: Venezuela and Beyond: Trump’s ‘America First’ Rhetoric Masks a Neo-Imperialist Streak
item.description: Trump returned to office propelled by a seemingly isolationist promise, but the U.S. capture of Maduro illustrates the White House’s growing fondness for military intervention—revealing a striking strategic incoherence.

item.title: From Regime Change to Regime Management: Washington’s Venezuela Strategy
item.description: CSIS Americas Deputy Director and Senior Fellow Christopher Hernandez-Roy analyzes future directions for Venezuela following the capture of Nicolás Maduro.
